notes: The Ironwood Tree is not consumed in the process.
Cannot be placed inside the fountain area (including a small area in front of the ramp), or in Roshan's pit.
Creates a regular tree at the target point. This tree is a hedge that spells "GG" and has a smaller collision size than other trees.
This means it blocks vision and is treated like any other tree by all abilities which interact with trees.
Tango heals for twice as long when targeting an Ironwood tree, using the ward duration instead of the tree duration.
The particles around the tree are visible to everyone, making it clear that it is a planted tree.
abilities.description: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

trivia: "Happy little tree" is a phrase once frequently said by Bob Ross, a popular landscape painter.
